8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Ayub narrated that :the Messenger of Allah said: "Whoever fasts Ramadan, then follows it with six from Shawwal, then that is (equal in reward) to fasting everyday

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صِيَامِ سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ مِنْ شَوَّالٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fasting The Six Days Of Shawwal
